moves.name: Mean Look
moves.description: The user pins the target with a dark, arresting look. The target becomes unable to flee.

moves.name: Zen Headbutt
moves.description: The user focuses its willpower to its head and attacks the target. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Leer
moves.description: The opposing team gains an intimidating leer with sharp eyes. The opposing team's Defense stats are reduced.

moves.name: Scratch
moves.description: Hard, pointed, and sharp claws rake the target to inflict damage.

moves.name: Foresight
moves.description: Enables a Ghost-type target to be hit by Normal- and Fighting-type attacks. It also enables an evasive target to be hit.

moves.name: Night Shade
moves.description: The user makes the target see a frightening mirage. It inflicts damage matching the user's level.

moves.name: Astonish
moves.description: The user attacks the target while shouting in a startling fashion. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Fury Swipes
moves.description: The target is raked with sharp claws or scythes for two to five times in quick succession.

moves.name: Fake Out
moves.description: An attack that hits first and makes the target flinch. It only works the first turn the user is in battle.

moves.name: Detect
moves.description: It enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

moves.name: Shadow Sneak
moves.description: The user extends its shadow and attacks the target from behind. This move always goes first.

moves.name: Knock Off
moves.description: The user slaps down the target's held item, preventing that item from being used in the battle.

moves.name: Feint Attack
moves.description: The user approaches the target disarmingly, then throws a sucker punch. It hits without fail.

moves.name: Punishment
moves.description: This attack's power increases the more the target has powered up with stat changes.

moves.name: Shadow Claw
moves.description: The user slashes with a sharp claw made from shadows. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Power Gem
moves.description: The user attacks with a ray of light that sparkles as if it were made of gemstones.

moves.name: Confuse Ray
moves.description: The target is exposed to a sinister ray that triggers confusion.

moves.name: Foul Play
moves.description: The user turns the target's power against it. The higher the target's Attack stat, the greater the damage.

moves.name: Zen Headbutt
moves.description: The user focuses its willpower to its head and attacks the target. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Shadow Ball
moves.description: The user hurls a shadowy blob at the target. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Mean Look
moves.description: The user pins the target with a dark, arresting look. The target becomes unable to flee.
